input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: STATE TREASURY PGL LP KOMAŃCZA FOREST DISTRICT. Summary: Providing Forest Management Services in the Komańcza Forest District in 2026. Description: The subject of the order are forest management services as defined in Art. 6 section 1 point 1 of the Act of September 28, 1991 on forests (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2025, item 567 - "Forest Act"), covering work in the field of forest breeding and protection, fire protection, harvesting and timber skidding, renovation and construction of new skidding trails, as well as hunting and meadow-agricultural management in the OHZ, to be carried out in the Komańcza Forest District in 2026.<br> The detailed scope of work is included in the order documents (Specification of Procurement Conditions - "SWZ" and its annexes).<br> Range The material scope of the subject of the order includes the total amount of works in the field of forest breeding and protection, fire protection, timber harvesting and skidding, renovations and construction of new logging routes, as well as hunting and meadow-agricultural management in the OHZ resulting from Annex No. 2 to the SWZ.<br> Subject scope listed in the annexes included in Appendix No. 2 are estimates.<br> Quality standards relating to all significant features of the subject of the contract are set out in Annex No. 3 to the SWZ.<br> Descriptions of activity codes describing individual forestry works, fire protection works, and works with the scope of hunting and meadow-agricultural management (activities) included in the subject of the order are described in Annex No. 3 to the SWZ.<br> The description of the rules for the acceptance procedure of forestry works, fire protection, hunting and meadow-agricultural works is included in Flood.... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: THE MUNICIPALITY OF PŁOŃSK REPRESENTED BY THE MAYOR OF PŁOŃSK. Summary: Revitalization of the Constitution Park of the 3Rd of May as Part of the Task Entitled: Adaptation of Green and Blue Infrastructure in Płońsk to Climate Change.. Description: Subject of the order:<br> The subject of the public procurement is a service consisting in the development of greenery in an existing park by increasing its biodiversity with a large number of new plantings, including native species and flowering and turf vegetation, conservation of old trees and unsealing asphalt surfaces in the form of alleys and replacing them with mineral and gravel alleys along with equipping the area with small architecture, as part of the task entitled: "Adaptation of the green and blue infrastructure in Płońsk to climate change."<br> Revitalization of Constitution Park 3 Maja with an area of 7,200 m2 (plot no. 754, precinct 217, Płońsk city) includes:<br> 1) carrying out specialist maintenance works in existing old trees, including carrying out a dendrological examination,<br> 2) introduction of new plantings of trees, shrubs, perennials and cover plants,<br> 3) sowing lawns,<br> 4)removing the asphalt from the alleys and creating a permeable mineral and gravel surface such as a stone carpet,<br> 5) disassembly of used concrete benches and baskets,<br> 6) equipping the area with small architecture (benches, baskets, chess tables and seats, pergolas for vines and solar-hybrid lamps).<br> On the task in question The Płońsk City Commune obtained funding under the call for proposals no.: FENX.02.04-IW.01-002/23, Measure FENX.02.04 Adaptation to climate change, prevention of disasters, Project type: Support for sustainable rainwater management systems involving aim.... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: THE MUNICIPALITY OF PŁOŃSK REPRESENTED BY THE MAYOR OF PŁOŃSK
output.Summary: Revitalization of the Constitution Park of the 3Rd of May as Part of the Task Entitled: Adaptation of Green and Blue Infrastructure in Płońsk to Climate Change.
output.Description: Subject of the order:<br> The subject of the public procurement is a service consisting in the development of greenery in an existing park by increasing its biodiversity with a large number of new plantings, including native species and flowering and turf vegetation, conservation of old trees and unsealing asphalt surfaces in the form of alleys and replacing them with mineral and gravel alleys along with equipping the area with small architecture, as part of the task entitled: "Adaptation of the green and blue infrastructure in Płońsk to climate change."<br> Revitalization of Constitution Park 3 Maja with an area of 7,200 m2 (plot no. 754, precinct 217, Płońsk city) includes:<br> 1) carrying out specialist maintenance works in existing old trees, including carrying out a dendrological examination,<br> 2) introduction of new plantings of trees, shrubs, perennials and cover plants,<br> 3) sowing lawns,<br> 4)removing the asphalt from the alleys and creating a permeable mineral and gravel surface such as a stone carpet,<br> 5) disassembly of used concrete benches and baskets,<br> 6) equipping the area with small architecture (benches, baskets, chess tables and seats, pergolas for vines and solar-hybrid lamps).<br> On the task in question The Płońsk City Commune obtained funding under the call for proposals no.: FENX.02.04-IW.01-002/23, Measure FENX.02.04 Adaptation to climate change, prevention of disasters, Project type: Support for sustainable rainwater management systems involving aim...

However, the offer submitted for a given Part must cover the entire scope of work provided for in the ToR for this Part. Scope of the subject orders it also includes preparation of documentation in electronic form, prepared separately for each forest district, which the Contractor will provide to the Ordering Party on electronic media.<br> 3.1.5. Description: The subject of the order is the extension of national road No. 60 on the 19.274 km section of Topola Krolewska - Kutno from km 0+000 to km 19+274 with the following parameters: GP class, load capacity 115 KN/axle, road width approximately 20 m, lane width 3.5, cross-section 2 x 3.5 m and 2 x 0.5 m as the hardened part of the lane road for maintenance purposes and 2 x 1.5 m width of roadsides), traffic category KR5. Due to the expansion, the gradeline will change. The task includes the construction of: two road viaducts at km 15+133 with a total length of 68.60 m and a width of 14.70 m and at km 15+435 with a length of 22.09 m and width 43.25 m, construction of a bridge with a total length of 13.10 m, total width of 11.45 m and the construction of a crossing for animals at km 16+032, 7.4 m long and 12.20 m wide. In addition, the scope of the investment includes the following: construction and reconstruction of 19 intersections, construction of pedestrian and bicycle paths, construction/reconstruction of 28 bus bays, construction of dirt roadsides, construction of a road drainage/rainwater drainage system, construction of traffic safety elements/devices, construction of power supply and cable ducting for traffic lights and its construction in 4 locations, construction of lighting road, construction of a service channel on the entire section of DK 60, reconstruction of 28 culverts, reconstruction of 240 exits.<br> Extension of national road No. 60 on the Topola Krolewska - Kutno section.<br> Doc Title: Extension of national road No. 60 on the Topola Krolewska - Kutno section.<br> Contract Type: works. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Scope The order includes: 1. Preparatory and cleaning works - grubbing up soft trees and stumps with a trunk diameter of 16 to 65 cm, - filling in places left by stumps in garden soil, - replanting younger trees with root masses with a diameter of over 0.30 to 0.50 m on a flat area in soil category III, with dressing up to half the depth of tree pits with a diameter and depth of 0.7 m - 18 pcs.2. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: BIAŁOWIEŻA FOREST DISTRICT. Summary: Purchase of Food for Winter Feeding of Bison and Delivery to Feeding Places as Part of the Project "Managing Bison Migration in Eastern Poland".. Description: The scope of work for feeding the cattle will include the delivery of 80 tons of food with delivery, ongoing maintenance of the cattle (e.g. nailing the railing torn off by animals), maintaining regular cleanliness around the feeding areas and shifting and scooping the delivered food. It is necessary to feed the coats from the implementation by the Forest District of the project Managing clothing migration in eastern Poland, financed from European Funds and the Forest Fund. The subject of the order includes the delivery of feed in the following composition and quantities: Hay 55 tons (in bales), from this year's harvest in the area Hajnowka County, in order to avoid the introduction of unwanted plant and parasite species; the moisture content of the supplied hay must not exceed 15%, without mechanical impurities, without mold, without grass, rushes and marsh sedges. The hay must be free of such features as: musty or rotten smell and impurities soil, straw, manure residues and harmful plants. Hay from one cut is preferred. Optionally, hay from the second cut is allowed. Hay should be placed in haystacks), Hay silage 2 tony.... Published Date: 2025-11-04. Closing Date: 2025-11-12. Competition: ICB. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: NAKŁO COUNTY. Summary: Development of the Park Nad Notecią in Terms of Greenery, Communication, Expansion of Lighting and Elements of Small Architecture. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the development of the park at the Nakielski County Marina by planting vegetation, managing trees and developing the area in the form of park paths, elements of small architecture and equipment.<br> 2. The scope of the project includes:<br> •Road part<br> •Part electric<br> •Part of the inventory and management of the existing forest stand<br> •Design part of new planting of trees and shrubs, construction of lawns and flower meadows<br> •Development of construction and executive design<br> •Installation of small architecture elements<br> 3. The park will be rich and attractive with native plants and numerous small architectural forms, it is intended to be a destination for the inhabitants of Nakło and the surrounding area, as well as a showcase of the city, complementing the already very popular marina. The project envisages planting as many trees as possible trees and plants (also in the "wild" formula) in a character matching the river marina. At the same time, structures are planned that will allow vines to be planted in the ground and placed on frames. The design assumptions provide for the division of the park into several functional zones. It will be found here is a relaxation and recreation zone, a nature education zone and a communication zone. An unusual geometric layout of the area was used, i.e. divided into two triangles connected by a narrow passage, and divided into two thematically separate and thus coherent zones. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: REGIONAL DIRECTORATE FOR ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION IN KRAKOW. Summary: Removal of Tree Patches Along with the Collection and Removal of the Accumulated Biomass in Order to Restore Habitat 6130 - Procedure Ii. Description: I. 1.1.1. The subject of the order is the felling of trees and the removal of deposited biomass on an area of ​​approximately 1.1 ha. The location of the work site is presented on the map constituting Appendix No. 1 to the OPZ. The trees to be removed are dense and have never been subject to maintenance work. Ordering party is not able to determine the amount of dead biomass deposited that should be removed after felling. The biomass resulting from the work should be collected and transported outside the area covered by the boundaries of Natura 2000 areas, and then disposed of. Transport of biomass other than wood is preferred large sheets dragged along the ground. The obligation to dispose of biomass lies with the Contractor.<br> 2. Details of the scope of the subject of this order (including a detailed description of the method of task implementation, intermediate deadlines) and maps with marked treatment areas - can be found in Annex No. 9 to SWZ Description of the Subject of the Order (OPZ).<br> 95 section 1 of the Act - requires the Contractor or subcontractor to employ, on the basis of an employment relationship, persons directed by the Contractor or subcontractor to perform activities involving physical work, such as: felling, collecting and transporting biomass, if the performance of these activities involves performing work in the manner specified in Art. 22 § 1 of the Act of June 26, 1974, Labor Code (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2023, item 1465, of 2024, items 878, 1222).<br> II. These orders will consist in the repetition of services consistent with the services that are the subject of this order and services similar to them in terms of the technological aspect of their implementation. The scope of these services will not exceed 50% of the value of this order.<br> Item the order was divided into 5 parts ("Packages"): Package I - forestry areas: Lipki, Dębiny and Przewięź, Package II - forestry areas: Busznica and Nowinka, Package III - forestry areas: Blizna and Klonownica, Package IV - forestry areas: Koniecbor and Masalszczyzna, Package V - forestry areas: Szkołki, Młynisko, .... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: STATE TREASURY STATE FOREST HOLDING STATE FORESTS DRETYŃ FOREST DISTRICT. Summary: Restoration and Reconstruction of Heathlands on Land under Decommissioned Power Lines in 2025 in the Dretyń Forest District. Description: The subject of the order is to remove unnecessary dendroflora and biomass on land owned by the State Treasury and managed by the Dretyń Forest District with a total area of ​​2.95 ha. and uncovering the soil with the removal of turf on an area of ​​0.70 ha.<br> Restoration and reconstruction of heathlands on land under decommissioned power lines in 2025 in the Dretyń Forest District<br> The subject of the order is to remove unnecessary dendroflora and biomass on land owned by the State Treasury and managed by the Dretyń Forest District. total area of ​​2.95 ha. and uncovering the soil with the removal of turf on an area of ​​0.70 ha. The subject of the order includes mowing, cutting out and removing undesirable dendroflora in the form of self-seeding, suckers and bloom of pines, birches, aspen, oaks, bird cherry (seedlings of pine, birch, bird cherry, oak uproot; mechanical removal) along with transporting the biomass beyond the boundaries of the heath area to a designated temporary storage site and uncovering the soil with removing the turf with a disc harrow. The location of temporary storage sites in both forest districts will be indicated by the ordering party<br> Title: Restoration and reconstruction of heathlands on land under decommissioned power lines in 2025 in the Dretyń Forest District<br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-10-29. Closing Date: 2025-11-25. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The subject of the order is the extension of national road No. 60 on the 19.274 km section of Topola Krolewska - Kutno from km 0+000 to km 19+274 with the following parameters: GP class, load capacity 115 KN/axle, road width approximately 20 m, lane width 3.5, cross-section 2 x 3.5 m and 2 x 0.5 m as the hardened part of the lane road for maintenance purposes and 2 x 1.5 m width of roadsides), traffic category KR5. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: STATE TREASURY STATE FOREST HOLDING STATE FORESTS DRETYŃ FOREST DISTRICT. Summary: Restoration and Reconstruction of Heathlands on Land under Decommissioned Power Lines in 2025 in the Dretyń Forest District. Description: The subject of the order is to remove unnecessary dendroflora and biomass on land owned by the State Treasury and managed by the Dretyń Forest District with a total area of ​​2.95 ha. and uncovering the soil with the removal of turf on an area of ​​0.70 ha.<br> Restoration and reconstruction of heathlands on land under decommissioned power lines in 2025 in the Dretyń Forest District<br> The subject of the order is to remove unnecessary dendroflora and biomass on land owned by the State Treasury and managed by the Dretyń Forest District. total area of ​​2.95 ha. and uncovering the soil with the removal of turf on an area of ​​0.70 ha. The subject of the order includes mowing, cutting out and removing undesirable dendroflora in the form of self-seeding, suckers and bloom of pines, birches, aspen, oaks, bird cherry (seedlings of pine, birch, bird cherry, oak uproot; mechanical removal) along with transporting the biomass beyond the boundaries of the heath area to a designated temporary storage site and uncovering the soil with removing the turf with a disc harrow. The location of temporary storage sites in both forest districts will be indicated by the ordering party<br> Title: Restoration and reconstruction of heathlands on land under decommissioned power lines in 2025 in the Dretyń Forest District<br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-10-27. Closing Date: 2025-12-03. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: Description: The subject of the order is "Successive delivery of food products for 2026" divided into seven Parts covering the supply of food products from various industries of the agri-food sector for four individual Ordering Parties - Buyers, i.e.: 1) Primary School No. 1. Henryk Sienkiewicz in Olecko (also the Dwarf Nursery in Olecko), 2) Primary School No. 2 named after Nicolaus Copernicus in Olecko, 3) Primary School. Marshal Jozef Piłsudski in Gąski, 4) Krasnal Kindergarten with Integration Departments in Olecko. The subject of the order also includes delivery ordered food items by the Contractor, based on partial orders, on its own, at its own expense and risk, including bringing them to the food warehouse premises of the Ordering Party - Buyers - indicated in the partial order by the Ordering Party - Buyer whose a given delivery will apply. The division of the subject of the contract is indicated in Chapter IV of the Specification of the terms of the contract, hereinafter referred to as the "SWZ". Primary School No. 2 named after Mikołaja Kopernika in Olecko is the Ordering Party conducting the proceedings based on<br> designation under Art. 41 of the Act of September 11, 2019, Public Procurement Law (Journal of Laws of 2024, item 1320, as amended), hereinafter referred to as the "Pzp Act" (letter EK.8223.3.2025 of August 25, 2025, of the Deputy Mayor of Olecko regarding the appointment of Ordering party.... Published Date: 2025-10-24. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
